translation.en: I'm stuck !
- Get back. - [ Barking ]
- Mr. Tweedy. - Eh ?
What is that chicken doing outside the fence ?
translation.zh: 这只鸡怎么在篱笆外面？ 我不知道 亲爱的 我…

translation.en: Oh ! [ Chuckles ] I don't know, love. I--
translation.zh: 我不知道 亲爱的 我…

translation.en: Just deal with it. Now !
I'll teach you to make a fool out of me.
translation.zh: 让我难堪 看我怎么教训你

translation.en: Now let that be a lesson to the lot of ya !
translation.zh: 你们要引以为鉴 没有鸡能逃出崔迪的农场

translation.en: No chicken escapes from Tweedy's farm !
translation.zh: 没有鸡能逃出崔迪的农场

translation.en: Morning, Ginger. Back from holiday ?
translation.zh: 早上好 金吉 度假回来了？

translation.en: I wasn't on holiday, Babs.
translation.zh: 不是度假 小芭 我被关禁闭了

translation.en: I was in solitary confinement.
translation.zh: 不是度假 小芭 我被关禁闭了 能自己待一会儿不是很好吗？

translation.en: Oh, it's nice to get a bit of time to yourself, isn't it ?
translation.zh: 能自己待一会儿不是很好吗？

translation.en: [ Clears Throat ] Roll call !
Come along now. You'll be late for parade.
Pip, pip. Quick march. Left, right, left, right.
translation.zh: 齐步走 快速前进 左右左

translation.en: Left, right, left, right ! Come on. Smarten up. Ooh !
Discipline ! Order !
translation.zh: 保持纪律 注意秩序 想当初我在皇家空军 长官命令起飞时

translation.en: Back in my R.A.F. days when the senior officer called for a scramble,
translation.zh: 想当初我在皇家空军 长官命令起飞时

translation.en: you'd hop in the old crate and tallyho.
translation.zh: 跳上破飞机就轰轰起飞了

translation.en: Chocks away ! Give over, you old fool. They just want to count us.
translation.zh: 行了吧 老傻瓜 他们只是想数数我们

translation.en: Oh, how dare you talk back to a senior ranking officer.
translation.zh: 你竟敢和高级军官顶嘴 想当初我在皇家空军…

translation.en: - Why, back in my R.A.F. days- .- Fowler, they're coming. Back in line.
translation.zh: 想当初我在皇家空军… 福勒 他们来了 快归队

translation.en: -Oh, right, right. -Oh !
There will be a stern reprimand for you, lad. You're grounded.
translation.zh: 你会受到严厉惩罚的 你被禁足了

translation.en: Attention !
Welcome back, hen. Is there a new plan ?
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 姐妹 有新计划吗？

translation.en: I thought we tried goin' under.
translation.zh: 我们不是试过从地下逃走了吗？

translation.en: Ah ! Over. Right.
translation.zh: 原来拿反了 这就对了

translation.en: How's the egg count ?
I've laid five eggs this morning. Five !
translation.zh: 我今天早上下了五颗蛋 五颗

translation.en: Shush ! Well-chuffed with that, I was--
translation.zh: -我真的很高兴 我… -安静 （鸡蛋产量记录）

translation.en: Oh, no. Edwina.
Bunty, why didn't you give her some of yours ?
translation.zh: 邦蒂 你怎么不给她几个蛋？

translation.en: I would have. She didn't tell me. She didn't tell anyone.
translation.zh: 她告诉我的话 我会给她的 可她跟谁都没说

translation.en: Oh, is Edwina off on holiday ?
[ Sighs ] We've got to get out of here.
Ginger ! Are we still on ?
translation.zh: 金吉 我们还继续吗？

translation.en: Oh, we're on, all right.
Spread the word, Mac. Meeting tonight in hut 17.
translation.zh: 玛可 通知大家今晚17号鸡舍见

translation.en: You called ? Nick and--
Fetcher. At your service.
Over here.
We need some more things.
Right you are, miss.
How about this quality handcrafted tea set ? Uh, no.
translation.zh: 这个上好的手工茶具怎么样？ -不要 -这个漂亮的项链和吊坠呢？

translation.en: Or this lovely necklace and pendant ? It's love--
translation.zh: -不要 -这个漂亮的项链和吊坠呢？ -是很漂… -或者这个漂亮的小东西

translation.en: Or this beautiful little number,
translation.zh: -是很漂… -或者这个漂亮的小东西

translation.en: all the rage in the fashionable chicken coops of Paris.
translation.zh: 是巴黎时尚鸡舍的新风潮

translation.en: Simply pop it on like so,
and as the French hens say, " Voila !"
That's French.
That's two hats in one, miss. For parties, for weddings.
translation.zh: 而且是两用的帽子 派对可用 婚礼也可用

translation.en: Oh, but madame, .this makes you look like a vision, like a dream.
translation.zh: 不得不说 这东西让你看起来像梦幻女神

translation.en: - Like a duck. - No, thank you.
We're making this. We need these things. Can you get them ?
translation.zh: 我们要做这个 需要这些东西 你们能拿到吗？

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh, this is a big job, miss.
translation.zh: 这可是个大工程 女士

translation.en: Oh, bigger than the others. No, no. This is gonna cost.
translation.zh: 比其他的都难搞 这很花钱的

translation.en: Same as always. One bag of seed.
translation.zh: 照常给你们一袋种子做报酬

translation.en: You call this pay ? It's chicken feed.
- What else could we give you? - Eggs.
- Eggs ? - Eggs.
- We can't give you our eggs. They're too valuable. - And so are we.
translation.zh: 我们的鸡蛋太珍贵了 不能给你们 我们也不是什么赔钱货

translation.en: After you, Fetcher.
After I what ?
Move ! Ooh !
Twenty-two and nine.
Fourteen shillings and threepence.
Seven and sixpence times three.
Two and nine.
Fourpence halfpenny.
D-oh ! Stupid, worthless creatures !
I'm sick and tired of making minuscule profits.
translation.zh: 我受够这微薄的利润了

translation.en: Hmm !
Oh, yes.
Those chickens are up to something.
Quiet. I'm onto something.
[ Mr. Tweedy ] .They're organized. I know it.
- I said, quiet. - That ginger one.
I reckon she's their leader.
- Mr. Tweedy ! - [ Gasps ]
I may finally have found a way to make us some real money around here,
translation.zh: 我终于找到能让我们赚大钱的办法了

translation.en: and what are you on about ?
Ridiculous notions of escaping chickens.
translation.zh: 鸡要逃跑这种无稽之谈

translation.en: -But-- But-- -It's all in your head, Mr. Tweedy. Say it !
translation.zh: 但是… 这全都是你的幻想 崔迪 说一遍

translation.en: It's all in me head. It's all in me head.
Now, you keep telling yourself that,
because I don't want to hear another word about it.
translation.zh: 因为我不想再听你提起这茬了

translation.en: - Is that clear ? - Yes, love.
But you know that ginger one--
They're chickens, you dolt !
translation.zh: 它们是鸡 你个笨蛋

translation.en: Apart from you, they're the most stupid creatures on this planet.
translation.zh: 是地球上除你之外最愚蠢的生物

translation.en: They don't plot, they don't scheme, and they are not organized !
translation.zh: 它们不会密谋、不会策划 它们没有组织

translation.en: - [ Chattering ] - Order ! Order !
- Quiet, everyone. Settle down. - [ Chattering ]
translation.zh: 大家安静 安静点 我要说一下…

translation.en: I would like to call to order- Please, if you could just settle--
translation.zh: 安静点 我要说一下… -请大家安静一下 -安静

translation.en: Let's have some discipline in the ranks ! What, what !
translation.zh: -请大家安静一下 -安静 遵守纪律 都听着

translation.en: - Thank you, Fowler. - In my R.A.F. days,
translation.zh: -谢谢你 福勒 -我在皇家空军时…

translation.en: we were never allowed to waste time with unnecessary chitchat.
translation.zh: 浪费时间闲聊可是大忌

translation.en: Yes, thank you, Fowler.
translation.zh: 是的 谢谢你 福勒

translation.en: Right ! [ Chuckles, Clears Throat ]
Carry on.
Now, I know our last escape attempt was a bit of a fiasco,
translation.zh: 我知道我们上次的逃跑计划失败了

translation.en: but Mac and I have come up with a brand-new plan.
translation.zh: 但玛可和我想出了一个新计划

translation.en: -Right. We tried going under the wire and that didn't work. -Show 'em, Mac.
translation.zh: -给她们看看 玛可 -好 我们试过从电线下面穿过去 但行不通

translation.en: So, the plan is, we go over it.
translation.zh: 所以我们计划从上面过去

translation.en: - [ Murmuring ] - This is us, right ?
We get in like this.
Wind her up and... let her go !
translation.zh: 上好发条 然后发射

translation.en: Good grief ! The turnip's bought it !
translation.zh: 天哪 这个萝卜完蛋了

translation.en: Farmer's coming !
Operation Cover-up !
Ouch !
-Mr. Tweedy ! - Ooh. Ouch.
-Where are you ? - Ooh. It's all in your head.
It's all in your head. It's all in your head.
Think, everyone, think. What haven't we tried yet ?
translation.zh: 各位想想 我们还没试过什么？

translation.en: We haven't tried not trying to escape.
Hmm. That might work.
What about Edwina ?
How many more empty nests will it take ?
Perhaps it wouldn't be empty if she'd spent more time layin' and less time escapin'.
translation.zh: 如果她把逃跑的时间省下来下蛋 就不会空窝了

translation.en: So laying eggs all your life...
translation.zh: 所以下一辈子的蛋 最后被拔毛填料烤熟 对你来说就够了？

translation.en: and then getting plucked, stuffed and roasted is good enough for you, is it ?
translation.zh: 最后被拔毛填料烤熟 对你来说就够了？

translation.en: It's a livin'.
You know what the problem is ?
The fences aren't just round the farm. They're up here in your heads.
translation.zh: 篱笆不止围住了农场 也禁锢了我们的思想

translation.en: There's a better place out there somewhere beyond that hill,
translation.zh: 那座山后有更好的地方

translation.en: and it has wide open spaces and lots of trees...
translation.zh: 那里有开阔的平原和树林

translation.en: and grass.
Can you imagine that ? Cool, green grass.
translation.zh: 你们能想象吗？ （天堂） 凉爽的草地

translation.en: - Who feeds us ? - We feed ourselves.
translation.zh: -谁给我们吃的？ -我们自力更生

translation.en: - Well, where's the farm ? - There is no farm.
- Then where does the farmer live ? - There is no farmer, Babs.
translation.zh: -那农夫住在哪里？ -没有农夫 小芭

translation.en: - Is he on holiday ? - He isn't anywhere. Don't you get it ?
translation.zh: 他去度假了吗？ 没有他了 你们还不明白吗？

translation.en: There's no morning head count, no farmers, no dogs and coops and keys...
translation.zh: 早上不用点名 没有农民和狗 没有鸡笼和钥匙

translation.en: and no fences.
In all my life I've never heard such a fantastic...
translation.zh: 我这辈子没听过这么精彩的…

translation.en: load of tripe !
Oh, face the facts, ducks.
The chances of us gettin' out of here are a million to one.
translation.zh: 我们离开这里的机率是百万分之一

translation.en: Then there's still a chance.
Oh, no, oh, no, oh, no. What am I doing ?
Who are you trying to fool ? You can't lead this bunch of--
translation.zh: 你想骗谁？你领导不了这群…

translation.en: [ Grunts ] Oh, heaven help us.
Freedom ! Huh ?
Thank you, ladies and gentlemen. You've been a wonderful audience.
translation.zh: 谢谢女士们先生们 你们是很棒的观众

translation.en: - Ouch ! - Oh, yes.
That's it. [ Barking ]
Get him inside quickly.
This is our way out of here.
translation.zh: （飞天公鸡 洛基） 这就是我们出去的办法

translation.en: We'll make posters ?
No. What's on the poster, Babs. What's on the poster. We'll fly out !
translation.zh: 不 是海报上的内容 小芭 我们要飞出去

translation.en: He must be very important to have his picture taken. What do you suppose he does ?
translation.zh: 他肯定很出名才会有照片 -你觉得他是做什么的？ -不是很明显吗？

translation.en: Isn't it obvious ? He's a professional flying rooster.
translation.zh: -你觉得他是做什么的？ -不是很明显吗？ 他是职业飞行公鸡

translation.en: He flies from farm to farm, giving demonstrations.
translation.zh: 从一个农场飞到另一个农场 -做示范表演 -你这么想吗？

translation.en: -Do you suppose ? -Oh, absolutely.
translation.zh: -做示范表演 -你这么想吗？ 当然

translation.en: Not in the dark, no. No, not in there. No. Get out. Good. Gotta get--
translation.zh: 不要在黑暗中 不能在里边 出来 很好…

translation.en: [ Gasps ] Who are you ? Where am I ? What's goin' on ?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？我在哪？怎么回事？

translation.en: Ouch ! What happened to my wing ?
translation.zh: 好痛 我的翅膀怎么了？

translation.en: You took a rather nasty fall.
And sprained the anterior tendon connecting your radius to your humerus.
translation.zh: 你桡骨和肱骨关节处 前肌腱扭伤

translation.en: I gave it a wee bit of a tweak, Jimmy, and wrapped her up.
translation.zh: 我轻轻揉捏了一下 把它包扎好了

translation.en: - Was that English ? - She said you sprained your wing. She fixed it.
translation.zh: -那是英语吗？ -她说你扭伤了翅膀 -她治好了 -我做的绷带

translation.en: -I made the bandage. -I-I carried you in.
[ Chuckles ] Let's back up and start from the top. Where am I ?
translation.zh: 从头再来 我在哪里？

translation.en: You're right. How rude of us. We're just very excit--
translation.zh: 你说得对 我们真没礼貌 我们只是很激动

translation.en: This is a chicken farm.
And we're the chickens.
Yeah, with you so far. Chicken farm, chickens--
translation.zh: 目前为止我还听得懂 养鸡场和鸡…

translation.en: I don't like the look of this one. His eyes are too close together.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这家伙的长相 -他的眼距太近了 -福勒 拜托

translation.en: -Father, please. -And he's a Yank !
translation.zh: -他的眼距太近了 -福勒 拜托 而且他是美国人

translation.en: Easy, Pops. Cockfighting's illegal where I come from.
translation.zh: 别激动 大叔 在我的家乡 斗鸡是违法的

translation.en: And where is that exactly ?
Just a little place I call the land of the free and the home of the brave.
translation.zh: 我称之为自由之地 勇敢者的家园

translation.en: - Scotland ! - No ! America.
[ Together ] Oh ! America.
Poppycock. Pushy Americans. Always showing up late for every war.
translation.zh: 胡说八道 爱出风头的美国人 每次打仗都迟到

translation.en: Overpaid, oversexed and over here !
translation.zh: 挣得多 又好色 还来这儿了

translation.en: Hey,what's eatin' Grandpa ?
Oh, don't mind him, Mister-- Mister ?
The name's Rocky. Rocky the Rhode Island Red. Rhodes for short.
translation.zh: 我叫洛基 罗德岛红毛洛基 简称罗兹

translation.en: -Rocky Rhodes ? -Catchy, ain't it ?
Um, Mr. Rhodes, is this you ?
translation.zh: 罗兹先生 这是你吗？

translation.en: Uh, who wants to know ?
A group of rather desperate chickens.
You see, if it is you, then you just might be the answer to our prayers.
translation.zh: 如果是你 那你可能是我们祈祷的答案

translation.en: Well, then, call me a miracle, doll face, 'cause that's me.
translation.zh: 那就叫我奇迹吧 娃娃脸 因为这就是我

translation.en: And what brings you to England, Mr. Rhodes ?
translation.zh: 你怎么会来英国呢 罗兹先生？

translation.en: Why, all the beautiful English chicks, of course.
translation.zh: 当然是因为美丽的英国小妞

translation.en: Give over !
You see, I'm a traveler by nature.
I did that whole barnyard thing for a while, but I couldn't really get into it.
translation.zh: 我在农场呆过一阵 但我不喜欢那的生活

translation.en: Hi. How are you ? Nope.
translation.zh: 嗨 你好吗？ 不要

translation.en: The open road. That's more my style.
Yep, just give me a pack on my back and point me where the wind blows.
translation.zh: 只需给我个背包 告诉我风向

translation.en: In fact, you know what they call me back home ?
translation.zh: 你知道在家乡他们叫我什么吗？ 你们会喜欢的

translation.en: You're gonna love this. The Lone Free Ranger.
translation.zh: 你知道在家乡他们叫我什么吗？ 你们会喜欢的 独孤游侠

translation.en: -Ooh ! -Isn't that great ?
-Oh, it's possible, all right. -I knew it was possible.
translation.zh: -我知道有可能 -有可能 对

translation.en: I knew the answer would come. Amen !
We're all going to fly over that fence, and Mr. Rhodes is going to show us how, right?
translation.zh: 我们要飞过那道篱笆 罗兹先生会示范给我们看 对吧？

translation.en: That's-- What ? Did you say "fly" ?
-You can teach us. -No, I can't.
translation.zh: -你可以教我们 -不 我不会

translation.en: - Listen. Shh. You hear that ? - [ Silence ]
That's the open road calling my name, and I was born to answer that call. Bye.
translation.zh: 大路在呼唤我 我为那个呼唤而生 再见

translation.en: He must have very good hearing.
Okay, okay, where's the exit ? Ah, this way.
translation.zh: 好了 出口在哪？这边

translation.en: Mr. Rhodes, um, perhaps I didn't explain our situation properly.
translation.zh: 罗兹先生 我们可能没说清情况

translation.en: We lay eggs day in and day out,
and when we can't lay any more, they kill us.
translation.zh: 下不出来之后 他们会杀死我们

translation.en: It's a cruel world, doll face. You might as well get used to it.
translation.zh: 这个世界很残酷 娃娃脸 你要习惯

translation.en: Which part of "they kill us" do you not understand ?
translation.zh: 他们会杀死我们 你难道不明白吗？

translation.en: I got my own set of problems to worry about.
Besides, this birdcage can't be that hard to bust out of.
translation.zh: 而且要逃出这个鸡窝并不难

translation.en: In fact, watch me.
It's not so hard to get one chicken out of here or even two,
but this is about all of us.
- All of you ? - That's what I've been trying to tell you.
translation.zh: 你们全体？ 这就是我想告诉你的

translation.en: Wait a minute. Let me get this straight.
translation.zh: 等一下 让我搞清楚 你想把这里所有鸡

translation.en: You want to get every chicken in this place out of here at the same time ?
translation.zh: 你想把这里所有鸡 同时带出去？

translation.en: -Of course. -You're certifiable.
You can't pull off a stunt like that. That's suicide.
translation.zh: 这不可能的 这是自杀

translation.en: Where there's a will, there's a way.
Couldn't agree more. I will be leaving that way. But--
translation.zh: 非常同意 我从那边走

translation.en: -Mr. Rhodes ? -♪I'm the type of guy ♪
translation.zh: -罗兹先生 拜托… -我就是那种男人

translation.en: -Please ! -♪That likes to roam around I'm never in one-- ♪
translation.zh: 四处漂泊 从不停留

translation.en: So that's it. You're from the circus.
translation.zh: （马戏团） 原来是这样 你是从马戏团来的

translation.en: You're on the run, aren't you ?
translation.zh: 你是逃出来的 对吧？

translation.en: You wanna keep it down ? I'm trying to lay low here. [ Doorbell Ringing ]
translation.zh: 能不能小声点？我想低调点

translation.en: I should turn you in right now.
translation.zh: 我应该立马把你交出去

translation.en: -You wouldn't. Would you ? -Give me one reason why I shouldn't.
translation.zh: 你不会的 你会吗？ 给我一个不会的理由

translation.en: Because I'm... cute ?
Hey, hey, hey ! What kind of crazy chick are you ?
It's a cruel world. Do you know what'll happen if he finds me ?
translation.zh: 你知道要是被他找到 我会是什么下场吗？ 这是个残酷的世界

translation.en: I just decided. I don't like you.
translation.zh: 我刚刚决定了 我不喜欢你

translation.en: I just decided. I don't care. Now, show us how to fly.
translation.zh: 我刚刚决定了 我不在乎 让我们看你飞

translation.en: -With this wing ? -Teach us then.
translation.zh: 用这双翅膀吗？ -那就教我们 -不

translation.en: -No ! -[ Squawking ]
[ Squawking ] He's valuable, you say ?
-Sure. -Get the torch.
Now you listen here, sister. I'm not going back to that life.
translation.zh: 你听好了 我不要回去过那种生活

translation.en: I'm a Lone Free Ranger. Emphasis on free !
translation.zh: 我是独孤游侠 追求的是自由

translation.en: And that's what we want. Freedom !
[ Chuckles ] .[ Ginger ] Fancy that. They're coming this way.
Oh, oh, no. No. Oh, no. They're on to me.
translation.zh: 不好 他们是来抓我的

translation.en: Teach us to fly and we'll hide you.
translation.zh: 教我们飞 我们就把你藏起来

translation.en: - And if I don't ? - [ Squawks ]
Was your father by any chance a vulture ?
Do we have a deal ?
Time to make good on that deal, doll--
translation.zh: 是时候做个交易了 娃娃…

translation.en: The name is Ginger.
- Comfortable ? - Not really.
-Maybe this will help. -[ Grunts ] Nice hideout.
translation.zh: 也许这会有帮助 藏身处不错

translation.en: Ouch. I had more room in my egg.
translation.zh: 好痛 我出生的蛋都比这宽敞

translation.en: We've held up our end of the deal. Tomorrow you hold up yours.
translation.zh: 我们兑现了我们的约定 明天你要兑现你的

translation.en: -What deal ? -The flying !
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Right, right, right. Don't worry.
I'll teach you everything I know.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会把知道的都教给你们

translation.en: Now, which bunk is mine ?
translation.zh: 好了 哪张床是我的？

translation.en: Absolutely outrageous !
Asking a senior officer to share his quarters...
translation.zh: 让高级军官分享他的营房

translation.en: and with a noncommissioned Yank, no less.
translation.zh: 还是和一个没军衔的美国人

translation.en: Why, back in my day, I'd never-- Hey !
You weren't exactly my first choice either.
And scoot over. .Your wing's on my side of the bunk.
translation.zh: 挪过去点 你的翅膀都伸到我这边的床来了

translation.en: Your side of the bunk ? The whole bunk is my side of the bunk !
translation.zh: 你那边的床？整个床都是我的

translation.en: Just-- What's that smell ? Is that your breath ?
translation.zh: 就… 什么味道？你口臭吗？

translation.en: It's absolutely outrageous.
[ Rocky ] So you wanna fly, huh ?
Well, it ain't gonna be easy, and it ain't gonna happen overnight either.
translation.zh: 这不容易的 不是一夜之间就能实现的

translation.en: You see, flying takes three things.
Hard work, perseverance and--
-Hard work. -You said hard work twice !
That's because it takes twice as much work as perseverance.
translation.zh: 因为努力要比毅力多一倍

translation.en: Codswallop ! [ Mutters ]
translation.zh: 胡言乱语 自大的美国佬自以为什么都懂

translation.en: Now, the most important thing is we have to work as a team,
translation.zh: 最重要的是我们必须团队合作

translation.en: which means... you do everything I tell you.
translation.zh: 也就是说你们要按我说的做

translation.en: Right ! Let's rock and roll.
Mrs. Tweedy ! The chickens are--
translation.zh: 崔迪太太 这些鸡在…

translation.en: Pecking ?
[ Rocky ] And left, two, three. And right, two, three.
translation.zh: 左 二 三 右 二 三

translation.en: And... stop right there. Oh, yeah, down.
translation.zh: 停在这里 对 往下

translation.en: Down. Yeah, yeah, make little circles. That's it. Faster.
translation.zh: 对 转圈圈 就是这样 再快点

translation.en: Faster. Oh, yes. Perfect.
translation.zh: 再快点 很好 太好了

translation.en: Oh, that's the spot. [ Sighs ]
I thought you were going to teach us how to fly.
translation.zh: 我以为你要教我们怎么飞

translation.en: That's what I'm doing.
Isn't there usually some flapping involved ?
Hey, do I tell you how to lay eggs ?
Relax. We're making progress.
translation.zh: 放轻松 我们在进步了

translation.en: Really ? I can't help feeling we're going around in circles.
translation.zh: 真的吗？我总觉得我们在绕圈子

translation.en: What the-- Hey ! Cut it out ! You're making me dizzy.
translation.zh: 搞什么？快停下 你们转得我头都晕了

translation.en: I think they're ready to fly now.
translation.zh: 好 我想她们准备好起飞了

translation.en: Good, because they certainly can't walk anymore.
translation.zh: 是啊 因为她们肯定走不了路了

translation.en: Up and at 'em, gals. Let's flap.
translation.zh: 站起来 姑娘们 让我们挥动翅膀

translation.en: Watch, Fetcher. Let's see if old Attila the Hen has come to her senses.
translation.zh: 看好了 菲奇 看看老母鸡改变主意了没有

translation.en: It's raining hen ! [ Screaming ]
What's this caper, love ? We're flying.
translation.zh: 这是什么行动 亲爱的？ -我们在飞 -可不是嘛

translation.en: Obviously.
They're gonna kill themselves. Look at this, Fetch. Flippin' hell.
translation.zh: 我的天 看这个 菲奇 她们会害死自己的

translation.en: -Wanna watch ? -Yeah, all right.
Hey ! Careful of those eggs !
Now they're over easy !
[ Nick ] Definitely scrambled.
Go ! Go ! Go !
Go, go, go, go ! Go !
Poultry in motion !
Birds of a feather flop together.
translation.zh: 物以类聚 鸟以群分

translation.en: Great work, ladies. Great work !
translation.zh: 干得好 女士们 干得好

translation.en: The pain you're feeling is a good thing. It's good.
Pain is your friend, okay ? It's a positive thing.
translation.zh: 痛苦是你们的朋友 懂吗？这是好事

translation.en: Just keep the faith there, uh- What was your name ? Agnes ! You'll get there.
translation.zh: 不要放弃 你叫什么？艾格尼丝 你会成功的

translation.en: Ducky, I think you flew four feet today.
translation.zh: 你今天好像飞了一米多

translation.en: Right, four feet ! From the roof to the ground.
translation.zh: 对 一米多 从屋顶掉到地上

translation.en: It's all part of the process, ladies. Nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 这是成功的必经之路 不用担心 女士们

translation.en: [ Whispers ] Ya cheese-eating little--
That doesn't sound good. Ha, ha, ha.
Okay, the ground's shaking. Are we worried ?
translation.zh: 地面在晃 我们要担心吗？

translation.en: Are we worried ?
The circus. Quick. Hide me.
translation.zh: 是马戏团 快把我藏起来

translation.en: -Hide me. -Come on.
translation.zh: 是马戏团 快把我藏起来 快点

translation.en: One isn't awarded a medal like this for flapping about like a lunatic, what.
translation.zh: 像疯子一样的傻瓜 可得不到这样的勋章

translation.en: [ Stammers ] Now, see here ! This is an officer's quarters.
translation.zh: 听着 这是军官的寝室

translation.en: -Quick. In here. -Get out of here immediately, sir !
Give it a rest, Pops.
Out of here ! I shall have you on a charge within the week.
translation.zh: 滚出去 我这周就起诉你

translation.en: Cheers, mate.
It's all in your head. It's all in your head.
It's all in your head.
What-- What-- What's all this then ?
This is our future, Mr. Tweedy.
translation.zh: 这是我们的未来 崔迪先生

translation.en: No more wasting time with petty egg collection and minuscule profits.
translation.zh: 不必再浪费时间收鸡蛋 挣微薄的利润了 不要鸡蛋？但我们一直都卖鸡蛋

translation.en: No more eggs ? But we've always been egg farmers.
translation.zh: 不要鸡蛋？但我们一直都卖鸡蛋 我爸爸、我爷爷还有祖先们都是

translation.en: Me father and his father and all their fathers. They was always--
translation.zh: 我爸爸、我爷爷还有祖先们都是

translation.en: Poor ! Worthless. Nothings.
translation.zh: 一贫如洗、一文不值、一无所有

translation.en: But all that's about to change.
translation.zh: 但这一切马上就改变了 这将让崔迪农场走出黑暗时代

translation.en: This will take Tweedy's farm out of the dark ages...
translation.zh: 这将让崔迪农场走出黑暗时代 进入全面自动化生产

translation.en: and into full-scale automated production.
[ Gasps ] Melisha Tweedy will be poor no longer.
translation.zh: 梅丽莎崔迪将不再贫穷

translation.en: Ooh !
I'll put it together then, shall I ?
This isn't good, Mac.
translation.zh: 情况不妙 玛可 我觉得箱子里不是柔软的干草

translation.en: Whatever's in those boxes is for us, and I don't think it's softer hay.
translation.zh: 我觉得箱子里不是柔软的干草 是的 亲爱的

translation.en: Aye, hen. And I hate to be the voice of doom,
translation.zh: 我不想泼冷水 但我一直在计算

translation.en: but I've been calculating my figures, and I just don't think we're built for flyin'.
translation.zh: 但我一直在计算 我觉得我们不是飞行的料 但我看到他飞了 他飞过了那个栅栏

translation.en: But I saw him. He flew in over that fence.
translation.zh: 但我看到他飞了 他飞过了那个栅栏

translation.en: Aye, aye, I believe you,
translation.zh: 对 我相信你 但如果我们能亲眼看到他飞 也许能答疑解惑

translation.en: but if we could just see it for ourselves, that may answer some questions.
translation.zh: 但如果我们能亲眼看到他飞 也许能答疑解惑

translation.en: You're right. I'm sorry.
We've been at this all week, and we're getting nowhere.
translation.zh: 我们已经试了一周了 却毫无进展

translation.en: If his wing were better, he could-- Oh ! I'll have a word with him.
translation.zh: 如果他的翅膀好一点 就能… 我和他谈谈

translation.en: Where is he ?
They didn't give me this medal for being a Yank nanny.
translation.zh: 我的勋章 不是靠给美国佬当保姆得来的

translation.en: A simple "I don't know" would suffice.
translation.zh: 直接说〝我不知道〞就行了

translation.en: Beware of that one, young Ginger.
translation.zh: 提防着他点 小金吉

translation.en: That Yank is not to be trusted.
That Yank is our ticket out of here.
translation.zh: 那个美国佬是我们离开这里的希望

translation.en: And the pig says to the horse, "Hey, fella, why the long face ?"
translation.zh: 那个美国佬是我们离开这里的希望 猪对马说 〝伙计 为什么拉着一张脸？〞

translation.en: Oh, oh, look, look.
Oh. Cocktail !
Give over !
So, um, anyway--
Remember those flying tips tomorrow. They're very important.
translation.zh: 记住明天的飞行技巧 非常重要

translation.en: Keep thinking those flighty thoughts.
Oh, yeah.
They're swell chicks. They really are.
translation.zh: 好 她们很棒 真的

translation.en: Look at what Babs made me. A beak warmer. Isn't that the cutest ?
translation.zh: 看小芭给我做了什么 鸟喙保温器 是不是很可爱？

translation.en: And that Bunty. [ Laughs ] She really packs a punch.
translation.zh: 还有那个邦蒂 她力气真大

translation.en: Is there a problem here ?
Have we flown over that fence ? Not quite.
translation.zh: 我们飞过那个栅栏了吗？

translation.en: - Then there's a problem. - Good things come to those who wait, doll face.
translation.zh: -还没有 -那就是有问题 要有耐心 娃娃脸

translation.en: Ginger !
To do what ? Okay, how long did it take you ?
translation.zh: 好吧 你花了多长时间？ -做什么？ -学习飞行

translation.en: To learn how to fly.
Apples and oranges, baby doll. I'm gifted. They're not.
translation.zh: 小可爱 这没法比 我天赋异禀 她们不是

translation.en: You can't compare the two, okay ?
translation.zh: 不能相提并论 好吗？

translation.en: The point is, these things take time.
translation.zh: 重点是这种事需要时间

translation.en: Which we are rapidly running out of.
We haven't even lifted off the ground. Why ? Thrust.
translation.zh: 我们甚至还没离开地面 为什么？ -推力 -什么？

translation.en: I went over my calculations, and I figured the key element we're missing is thrust.
translation.zh: 我又计算了一遍 发现我们主要缺失的是推力

translation.en: I-I didn't get a word of that.
Thrust ! Other birds like ducks and geese,
translation.zh: 推力 鸭和鹅等鸟类起飞时 它们有什么？

translation.en: when they take off, what do they have ? Thrust.
translation.zh: 鸭和鹅等鸟类起飞时 它们有什么？ 推力

translation.en: I swear she ain't usin' real words.
translation.zh: 我发誓这是她自造的词

translation.en: Oh, thrust. She said we need more thrust.
translation.zh: -她说我们需要更多推力 -推力

translation.en: Well, of course, we need thrust. Thrust and flying are like this.
translation.zh: 我们当然需要推力 推力和飞行就像 像这样 这是飞行 这是推力

translation.en: That's flying and that's thrust.
translation.zh: 像这样 这是飞行 这是推力

translation.en: -Would you excuse us ? -Aye.
Ah, the wing, the wing, the wing.
If we don't see some results by tomorrow, the deal is off, and you're on your own.
translation.zh: 如果明天还看不到结果 约定就取消 你好自为之

translation.en: No more hiding. The farmers will find you, and it's back to the circus, flyboy.
translation.zh: 我们不帮你藏身了 农夫会找到你 你就回马戏团吧 飞行小子

translation.en: You're the first chick I ever met with the shell still on.
translation.zh: 我没见过像你脾气这么大的妞

translation.en: Sleep tight, angel face. The Rock's on the case. [ Clicks Tongue ]
translation.zh: 睡个好觉 小天使 洛基要上场了

translation.en: Ginger !
[ Fowler Clears Throat ] Cock-a-doodle-doo ! What, what.
translation.zh: 公鸡 喔喔叫 什么？

translation.en: [ Nick ] Oh, it was a beaut, guv'nor. Hmm ?
translation.zh: 不 很精彩的 先生

translation.en: A fine piece of work, if I do say so meself.
translation.zh: 不是我自夸 我们的身手好得很

translation.en: -I say so meself too. -I wish I could have seen it.
translation.zh: -我也这么觉得 -真希望我能见识一下

translation.en: We slipped into the farmer's room, all quiet like.
-Like a fish. -Yeah, and we--
"Like a fish" ? You stupid Norbert.
translation.zh: 像条鱼？ 你这个笨蛋

translation.en: Anyway, guv, here it is.
El merchandiso. That's Spanish.
- What are these two crooks doing here ? - So, you know each other.
translation.zh: 这两个骗子在这里做什么？ 原来你们认识

translation.en: She don't think we're valuable.
Guys, you are without a doubt the sneakiest,
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 你们是我见过

translation.en: most light-fingered thieving parasites I've ever met.
translation.zh: 最会偷鸡摸狗、顺手牵羊的小贼

translation.en: Oh, don't, don't. Stop it. I've gone bright red.
translation.zh: 快别说了 我脸都红了

translation.en: So, uh, how about them eggs ?
Yep ! Eggs ? Don't tell me you promised them--
translation.zh: -鸡蛋？别告诉我你答应他们了 -对

translation.en: Promised them every egg I lay this month.
translation.zh: 我答应把我这个月下的蛋都给他们

translation.en: And when can we expect the first installment ?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候能拿到第一桶金？

translation.en: I'm brewing one up as we speak, guys. I'll keep you posted.
translation.zh: 我正准备着呢 有消息我会通知你们

translation.en: Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
translation.zh: 很高兴和你做生意 先生

translation.en: Sucker.
-What ? -You've lied to them.
I didn't lie, doll face. I just... omitted certain truths.
translation.zh: 我没有说谎 娃娃脸 我只是省去了一些事实

translation.en: I'll give them exactly what I promised.
-Which is nothing. -Which is what I'll give them.
translation.zh: -你约定的是零光蛋 -这就是我要给他们的

translation.en: And what will you give us ?
Thrust !
[ Rocky ] You okay, sweetheart ? Good, good.
translation.zh: 你还好吗 亲爱的？很好

translation.en: Now this is just a little helper.
Something to get you going. It's a thrust exercise.
translation.zh: 是能帮你练习起飞的推力训练

translation.en: The tension's killing me. It's gonna kill her !
- Release ! - Whoa !
Come on ! Flap !
You can do it. Flap, flap, flap !
Yes, yes, yes !
Is that your first offense ?
Roll call ! I haven't laid any eggs.
translation.zh: 点名了 我还没下过蛋

translation.en: -Hide me. -Three days and not one.
translation.zh: -把我藏起来 -三天没下过蛋了 不

translation.en: - Oh, no ! -Why didn't you tell us, Babs? - Hide me !
translation.zh: -你怎么不说呢？ -把我藏起来 -我们忙着飞来飞去 -他们来了

translation.en: We've been so busy with the flying--
translation.zh: -我们忙着飞来飞去 -他们来了

translation.en: -They're coming ! -Hide me !
translation.zh: -我们忙着飞来飞去 -他们来了 -把我藏起来 -自己去藏

translation.en: Hide yourself !
Double their food rations, Mr. Tweedy.
translation.zh: 给它们双倍的食物 崔迪

translation.en: I want them all as fat as this one.
translation.zh: 我要它们都跟这个一样肥

translation.en: All of me life flashed before me eyes !
translation.zh: 我这一生如走马灯一般从眼前闪过

translation.en: It was really borin'.
Chicken feed. My favorite !
Wait. Wait.
No. Wait !
Babs, please ! Bunty ! Stop it ! Wait !
translation.zh: 小芭 拜托 邦蒂 停下 等等

translation.en: Stop !
Stop it !
Something is wrong here. Can't you see that ?
translation.zh: 这不对劲 你们看不出来吗？

translation.en: Strange boxes arrive in the barn.
translation.zh: 奇怪的箱子来到了谷仓

translation.en: Babs stops laying, but they don't take her to the chop,
translation.zh: 小芭没有下蛋 却没有被杀

translation.en: and now they're giving us extra food.
translation.zh: 现在他们又多给我们食物 你们还不明白吗？他们要把我们养肥

translation.en: Don't you see what's happening? They're fattening us up.
translation.zh: 你们还不明白吗？他们要把我们养肥

translation.en: -They're going to kill us all. - [ Gulping ]
Whoa, whoa ! Heavy alert. [ Laughs ]
-She didn't mean that, gals. -Do you mind ?
translation.zh: -她不是那个意思 姑娘们 -你有事吗？ 继续吃 给我留点

translation.en: Keep eating. Save some for me.
What are you doing ? How dare you ! Let go of me !
translation.zh: 你在干什么？你好大的胆子 放开我

translation.en: Listen. I've met some hard-boiled eggs in my day,
translation.zh: 听着 我这辈子见过不少水煮蛋

translation.en: but I'd say you're about 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你是最难熟的

translation.en: -What's that supposed to mean? - It means you got to lighten up.
translation.zh: 这话什么意思？ 意思是你要聪明点

translation.en: Over in America, we have this rule.
translation.zh: 在美国 我们有条规矩

translation.en: If you want to motivate someone, don't mention death.
translation.zh: 要激励别人 就不要提及死亡

translation.en: Funny. Over here, the rule is: Always tell the truth.
translation.zh: 真有意思 这里的规矩是永远讲真话 嘿 这招还挺管用的 是吗？

translation.en: That's been working like a real charm, hasn't it ?
translation.zh: 嘿 这招还挺管用的 是吗？

translation.en: Here's some free advice. You want them to perform ?
translation.zh: 给你点免费建议 你要她们好好干？

translation.en: Tell them what they wanna hear.
You mean lie.
Here we go again. You know what your problem is ?
translation.zh: 又来了 你知道你的问题是什么吗？

translation.en: You're... difficult.
Why ? Because I'm honest ? I care about what happens to them,
translation.zh: 为什么？因为我诚实？ 我在乎她们 我认为独孤游侠是不会懂的

translation.en: something I wouldn't expect a lone free ranger to know anything about.
translation.zh: 我认为独孤游侠是不会懂的 如果你就是这么表达在乎的 希望你永远不要在乎我

translation.en: If this is the way you show it, I hope you never care about me.
translation.zh: 如果你就是这么表达在乎的 希望你永远不要在乎我

translation.en: -I can assure you, I never will. -Good !
translation.zh: 我保证永远不会 -很好 -好

translation.en: What's all this ?
Well, here she is. Ask and you shall receive.
translation.zh: 拿好 我们有求必应

translation.en: - That's biblical. - That's real craftsmanship is what it is.
translation.zh: -这是《圣经》里的话 -这是真正的工艺

translation.en: -Solid as a rock. -Ooh !
[ Static ] It's supposed to do that.
- It's perfect, guys. - And how's that egg coming ?
translation.zh: 很完美 伙计们 鸡蛋呢？

translation.en: This is a double yolker.
I don't see what this has to do with-- ♪[ Jazz ] You will.
We've been workin' too hard.
Time to kick back a bit, shake those tail feathers.
translation.zh: 是时候放松一下 摇摇尾巴了

translation.en: Look at him. Nellypodging around like a--
translation.zh: 看他扭来扭去 像个…

translation.en: Oh, good heavens. What's happenin' ?
That's called a beat, sister. Feel it pulsing through your body ?
translation.zh: 这叫节奏 妹妹 感觉到它在身体里的律动了吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes. Pulsing. Fancy that.
translation.zh: 是的 律动 真不错 那就动起来 宝贝

translation.en: Hey, well, then go with it, baby.
Oh, my. Look ! I'm going with it !
translation.zh: 天啊 看 我动起来了

translation.en: Bunty, what's got into you ?
translation.zh: 邦蒂 你怎么了？ 显然和你一样

translation.en: Same thing that's got into you apparently.
♪I don't care if I die ♪ Just go with the flow, gals!
♪Flip, flop, fly ♪ Let it go !
Now, see here. I don't recall authorizing a hop.
translation.zh: 搞什么？我可不记得允许大家跳舞

translation.en: Oh, shut up and dance.
[ Crying ] What are you sobbing about, you nancy ?
translation.zh: 你怎么哭得跟个小姑娘似的？

translation.en: Little moments like this, mate. It's what makes the job all worthwhile.
translation.zh: 这样的时刻 让这份工作变得值得

translation.en: Wanna dance ?
Yeah, all right.
[ Giggles ] Did ya see that ? I flew !
translation.zh: 你们看到了吗？我飞起来了

translation.en: Attagirl, Babsy. Attagirl.
translation.zh: 好样的 小芭 你的翅膀 好多了

translation.en: Well-- Oh ! Your wing. It's better.
translation.zh: 你的翅膀 好多了 是啊

translation.en: -How about that ? -Fantastic.
You can fly for us tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你明天可以给我们展示飞行了

translation.en: Uh, uh, yeah, so it seems.
translation.zh: 对 看起来是这样的

translation.en: I flew ! I flew !
Looks like I owe you an apology.
I didn't think you cared about us, but after all this--
translation.zh: 我以为你不在乎我们 但经过这一切

translation.en: Well, it seems I was wrong.
Hey, easy, Miss Hard-boiled.
I might think you're turning soft.
Uh, listen, there's something I got to tell ya.
translation.zh: 听着 有件事我得告诉你

translation.en: I-- .[ Rumbling, Electricity Crackles ]
- [ Chattering ] - No. You'd better wait here.
Ooh, that's champion, that is. What is it ?
translation.zh: 真是个宝贝 这是什么？

translation.en: It's a pie machine, you idiot.
Chickens go in, pies come out.
Ooh ! What kind of pies ?
- Apple. - My favorite !
Chicken pies, you great lummox ! Imagine it.
translation.zh: 当然是鸡肉馅饼 你个大笨蛋 试想一下

translation.en: In less than a fortnight, every grocers' in the county...
translation.zh: 不出两周 县里每家杂货店都会有一箱箱的

translation.en: will be stocked with box upon box...
translation.zh: 县里每家杂货店都会有一箱箱的

translation.en: of Mrs. Tweedy's Homemade Chicken Pies.
translation.zh: 崔迪太太自制鸡肉馅饼

translation.en: Just Missus ?
Woman's touch. Makes the public feel more comfortable.
translation.zh: 大家比较喜欢女人的手艺

translation.en: Oh, right. How does it work ?
[ Gasps ] Get me a chicken and I'll show you.

translation.en: I know just the one.
I've got a score to settle with you.
Bloomin' heck ! They've got Ginger !
translation.zh: 天啊 他们抓走金吉了

translation.en: We mustn't panic. We mustn't panic !
[ All Screaming ] [ Fowler ] Quiet there !
Quiet, I say ! Let's have some discipline, what, what.

translation.en: The enemy has taken a prisoner. This calls for retaliation !
translation.zh: 敌人抓走一名俘虏 -我们需要反击 -什么？

translation.en: -Retaliation ! -What's going on ? What's happening ?
translation.zh: -反击 -什么？怎么回事？ 怎么回事？

translation.en: They got Ginger, Mr. Rhodes. They're taking her to the chop !
translation.zh: 他们抓了金吉 罗兹先生 他们要把她剁了

translation.en: Well, what are you waiting for, laddie ? Fly over there. Save her !
translation.zh: 你还在等什么 孩子？飞过去救她

translation.en: Of course-- No, no ! No, that's just what they'd expect.
translation.zh: 当然 不 那正中他们下怀

translation.en: But I say we give them the old element of surprise.
translation.zh: 我建议让他们出其不意

translation.en: And catch Jerry with his trousers down.
I like the sound of that. What's the plan ?

translation.en: The plan-- The plan.
The plan-- Uh, Babs !
Give me that thing. Bunty, give me a boost.
translation.zh: 把这个给我 邦蒂推我一把

translation.en: Whoa. Look at the size of that thing.
Oh, no !
Chickens go in,
pies come out.
[ Chuckles ] Chicken pies.
Not-- Not apple pies.
[ Mr. Tweedy ] Chicken !
Oh, great. Brilliant !
- Yo, baby doll ! - Rocky !
-I'm coming ! -Hurry !
- I'm still coming ! - Come on !
- Stop this thing ! - I'm gettin' there !
Oh, shoot !
[ Ginger ] Rocky !
I'll be down before you can say... [ Gasps ]
mixed vegetables !
Aaah ! Ohh !
D-oh ! Get it ?
-Dough ! -I'm stuck !
Nothing to it. Oops.
Hang on !
Look out !
Hey ! Aha !
Yes ! [ Laughing ]
Oh, it's like an oven in here.
Come on !
Wait up ! I'm com--
Don't leave--
Get over to the--
The door ! Come on ! [ Grunts ]
She's gonna blow ! Run !

translation.en: - Huh ? - [ Bell Continues Ringing ]
What did you do, you great pudding ? I didn't do 'owt !
translation.zh: -你做了什么 你这个大蠢货？ -我什么都没做

translation.en: -Turn it off ! -It won't turn off !
-Ouch ! -We've got to show the others. Come on.
translation.zh: -好痛 -我们得给大家看看 来吧

translation.en: Look ! I fixed it !
-Chicken pies ? -Ohh ! Oh, no !
- Yes, but-- - I don't want to be a pie.
translation.zh: -是的 但是… -我不想当馅饼

translation.en: [ Chickens Continue Exclaiming ] I don't like gravy.
Ladies, please. Let's not lose our heads.
translation.zh: 姑娘们 不要失去头脑

translation.en: Lose our heads ?
What I meant to say was, Rocky sabotaged the machine and bought us more time.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 洛基破坏了机器 为我们争取了更多时间

translation.en: And better still, he's going to fly for us tomorrow.
translation.zh: 更好的是他明天会给我们展示飞行

translation.en: [ Cheering ] And once we've seen how's it done, we'll get it.
translation.zh: 一旦我们知道如何飞行 我们就能做到 我们可以的 别担心

translation.en: So don't worry,
translation.zh: 我们可以的 别担心 因为明天一切都会更加顺利

translation.en: because tomorrow everything's going to go much, much smoother.
translation.zh: 因为明天一切都会更加顺利

translation.en: All right, Pops, what did I do now ?
translation.zh: 好了大叔 我又做错什么了？ 非常勇敢和光荣的行为 先生

translation.en: A very brave and honorable deed, sir.
translation.zh: 非常勇敢和光荣的行为 先生

translation.en: [ Clears Throat ] In the light of your action this evening, I--
I dutifully admit that I have misjudged your character.
So I present you with this medal for bravery. [ Chuckles ]
translation.zh: 所以我要授予你勇敢奖章

translation.en: And...
I salute you.
In honor of the occasion, I surrender the bunk entirely.
translation.zh: 为表敬意 床铺都给你

translation.en: I shall sleep under the stars. [ Chuckles ]
Oh, uh, I await tomorrow's flying demonstration... with great anticipation.
translation.zh: 我很期待明天的飞行演示

translation.en: You and me both, Pops.
- Oh ! - I'm sorry. Were you--
translation.zh: -对不起 你是不是… -这是你的…

translation.en: - Is this your-- I'll get down. - No, no, it's just--
translation.zh: -对不起 你是不是… -这是你的… 不 只是…

translation.en: -No, I'm glad you're here, because -Since you're here
translation.zh: 不 只是… -既然你来了 有件事… -我很高兴你来了 因为…

translation.en: You go ahead. I'll-- I'm sorry. You go first.
translation.zh: -对不起 你先说 -你先说 我…

translation.en: Um, I just wanted to say...
I may have been a bit harsh at first.
translation.zh: 我一开始可能有点苛刻

translation.en: Well, what I really mean is, thank you...
translation.zh: 我真正想说的是 谢谢你

translation.en: for saving my life.
our lives. For saving
You know, I come up here every night...
and look out to that hill and just imagine what it must be like on the other side.
translation.zh: 眺望着那边的山丘 想象它另一边的样子

translation.en: It's funny, I've--
I've never actually felt grass beneath my feet.
translation.zh: 我从未感受过踩在草地上的感觉

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Here I am rambling on about hills and grass, and you had something to say.
translation.zh: 我讲起山丘和草地就没完没了 你不是也有话想说吗？

translation.en: Uh, y-y-yeah.
Um, it's just that, y-you know,
life as I've experienced it, you know, out there,
translation.zh: 你知道 我在野外经历的生活

translation.en: lone free rangin' and stuff, it's, uh,
translation.zh: 孤身游荡 无拘无束

translation.en: it's full of disappointments and, uh--
What, you mean grass isn't all it's cracked up to be ?
translation.zh: 你是说草地没有人们说的那么好？

translation.en: Grass ! Exactly. Grass.
It's always greener on the other side.
translation.zh: 另一头的草地总是看起来更绿

translation.en: And then you get there and it's brown and prickly.
translation.zh: 但当你到那里以后 它就变得枯萎又多刺

translation.en: You see what I'm tryin' to say ?
What I'm trying to say is,
[ Sighs ] you're welcome.
You know, that hill is looking closer tonight than it ever has before.
translation.zh: 今晚那座山 看起来比以往任何时候都要近

translation.en: [ Clears Throat ] Well, good night... Rocky.
Good night... Ginger.
Company, attention !
Well, today's the day, girls. We're going to fly !
translation.zh: 就是今天了 姐妹们 我们要飞了

translation.en: I can feel it ! [ Cheering, Laughing ]
Finally, we get to see a real professional in action.
translation.zh: 我们终于能看到专业人士的演示了

translation.en: Better start warming up. I'll go and get him.
translation.zh: 开始热身吧 我去叫他

translation.en: [ Knock On Door ] Rocky. Knock-knock.
Everyone's waiting, so I told them to--
translation.zh: 大家都在等了 我让他们先…

translation.en: R-Rocky ?
[ Mac ] Oh, a cannon.
Aye, that would give you thrust.
I knew he was fake all along.
In fact, I'm not even certain he was American.
translation.zh: 其实我甚至怀疑他是不是美国来的

translation.en: So, what's the next plan, hen ?
translation.zh: 下一步怎么办 亲爱的？

translation.en: [ Sighs ] Let's face it.
The only way out of here is wrapped in pastry.
translation.zh: 唯一的出路就是被包在馅饼里

translation.en: Perhaps he just went on holiday.
translation.zh: 也许他只是去度假了 也许他只是想逃离你织个没完的毛衣

translation.en: Perhaps he just went to get away from your infernal knitting !
translation.zh: 也许他只是想逃离你织个没完的毛衣

translation.en: You were always the one that was always hitting him. See how you like it.
translation.zh: 是你一直跟他打情骂俏 看你喜不喜欢

translation.en: Don't push me, four-eyes !
- [ All Yelling, Chattering ] - Quiet there !
Quiet, I say !
Dissension in the ranks. Precisely what Jerry would have wanted.
translation.zh: 内部有矛盾 会正中敌人的下怀

translation.en: The old divide and conquer.
A proper squadron work together, like we did in my R.A.F. days.
translation.zh: 一个好的中队应该齐心协力 像我在皇家空军时那样

translation.en: Jocko at the stick, Flappy at the map...
translation.zh: 卓高负责驾驶 法比负责导航

translation.en: and old Whizzbang at the tail-end Charlie.
translation.zh: 老韦兹邦负责机尾机枪

translation.en: WingCo would give the call, hop in the old crate, chocks away !
translation.zh: 长官一声令下 立刻跳上破飞机轰轰起飞

translation.en: Wizard show it was. That's how you get medals.
translation.zh: 就是这样的效率才能拿勋章

translation.en: Will you shut up about your stupid blooming medals !

translation.en: How dare you !
- [ Groans ] - Madam, forgive me.
A-As an officer, I offer my most--

translation.en: Fowler ?
Everyone, shut up !
[ Clears Throat ] Fowler.
What exactly is the R.A.F. ?
What do you mean, what is it ?
The Royal Air Force is what. [ Chuckles ]
Then what's the "old crate" ?
Ahh ! There she is.
Gorgeous, isn't she ?
You mean, you flew in one of these ?

translation.en: Beautifully built. In fact, there's a bit of a story to that as well.
translation.zh: 外形完美 其实这也是有故事的

translation.en: We were out on a "recce," you see.
Ops had given the go-ahead, but the weather duffed up.

translation.en: Yes. Of course. [ Fowler Continues ]
We might actually be able to pull this off.
- We're still going to fly out of here. - What, what ?
Fowler's provided the answer.
I have ?
Uh, yes, yes, yes. Of course I have.
Uh, how have I ?
We'll make...
a crate.
[ Ginger ] .Mac, you'll handle the engineering.
Babs, manufacturing.
Fowler will be chief aviation advisor.

translation.en: Bunty, eggs.
- Eggs ? - Eggs.
Right, just like the ones that rooster was gonna lay.
translation.zh: 可不吗 就像那只公鸡要下的蛋一样

translation.en: Only roosters don't lay eggs, do they ?

translation.en: -Don't they ? -No, it's a lady thing, apparently.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是 这显然是女人的事

translation.en: Ask your mum.
One egg for every item on the list. First payment in advance.
translation.zh: 清单上每样东西给一个鸡蛋 预付第一笔费用

translation.en: [ Simultaneously ] Right ! When do we start ?
translation.zh: 清单上每样东西给一个鸡蛋 预付第一笔费用 好的 什么时候开始？

translation.en: [ Slurps ] Come on !
[ Giggles ] Hey.
What the dickens ?
Oh, gnomes now.
- Voila ! -[ Giggles ]
- Give me. - [ All Chattering ]
Ohh ! [ Giggles ] All right, here.
Eggs from heaven !
[ Laughs ] No ! From her bum !
- Idiot ! - That was close.
translation.zh: 白痴 就差一点就修好了

translation.en: Too close.
We can't stop now. Come on, everyone ! Go for it !
translation.zh: 我们现在不能停 大家加油

translation.en: Really go for it ! Go, go, go, go !
-Mac, we need those calculations quickly. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 玛可 我们需要快点算出来

translation.en: Agnes, that has to be really secure.

translation.en: Roger ! Careful up there, Fowler !
translation.zh: -在上面小心点 福勒 -收到

translation.en: Bunty, give him a hand.
Well done, Babs. Keep it up.

translation.en: No problem, doll face.
♪[ Rhythm And Blues ]
[ Singing Along With Radio ] ♪Oh, I'm the type of guy ♪
♪That likes to roam around ♪
♪I'm never in one place ♪
♪I roam from town to town ♪
♪And when I found myself fallin' for some girl ♪

translation.en: ♪I'd hop right in that car-- ♪
translation.zh: 我会跳上那辆车 （这是女人的手艺）

translation.en: [ Radio Continues ] ♪And travel 'round the world ♪ ♪'Cause I'm a wanderer ♪
♪I roam around and 'round Around and 'round ♪

translation.en: ♪[ Continues ] ♪'Cause I'm a wanderer ♪
♪Yeah, a wanderer ♪
Oh, boy.

translation.en: ♪I roam around and 'round Around and 'round, around ♪

translation.en: Come on.
Please.
Oh, no. He's fixed it.
[ Thunder Crashing ] Get the chickens.
Which ones ?
All of them.
Me tools !
Why, you thieving little buggers !
What's the plan ?
- Attack ! - Huh ?
Nice plan.
- [ Chickens Shouting ] - Mrs. Tweedy !
-Aaaah ! -Mrs. Tweedy !
The chickens are revolting !
Finally, something we agree on.
Help ! Mrs.--
Under the hut.
translation.zh: 把他拉到鸡舍下面 快点

translation.en: -What have we done ? -This is it, everyone.
translation.zh: -我们做了什么？ -就这样了 各位

translation.en: We're escaping.
- What, now ? - Now !
But, Ginger, she's not ready. Listen.
translation.zh: -可是金吉 她还没准备好 -听着

translation.en: We'll either die free chickens or die trying.
translation.zh: 我们要么任人处死 要么死得壮烈

translation.en: Are those the only choices ?
- Let's do it. - Scramble !
This way !
[ Muffled Shout ] Mrs. Tweedy !
The exits are located here and here.
In the quite likely event of an emergency,
put your head between your knees and--
translation.zh: 把头放在膝盖之间 然后…

translation.en: Kiss your bum good-bye.
All right, Fowler, ready for takeoff.
translation.zh: 好了 福勒 准备起飞

translation.en: Behind you all the way.
But you're supposed to be up there.
You're the pilot.
translation.zh: 你是飞行员啊 别傻了 我不会开这玩意儿

translation.en: Oh, don't be ridiculous. I can't fly this contraption. [ Chickens Gasping ]
translation.zh: 别傻了 我不会开这玩意儿 你在皇家空军的时候…

translation.en: Back in your day-- the Royal Air Force--
6-4-4 Squadron, poultry division.
We were the mascots.
You mean you never actually flew the plane ?
Good heavens, no.
- I'm a chicken. - [ All Gasp ]
The Royal Air Force doesn't let chickens behind the controls
translation.zh: 皇家空军不会让鸡 来驾驶如此精密的飞机

translation.en: of a complex aircraft.
translation.zh: 来驾驶如此精密的飞机

translation.en: [ Screaming, Wailing ] We're all gonna die !
Fowler, you have to fly it.
translation.zh: 福勒 你必须驾驶它

translation.en: You're always talking about back in your day. Well, today is your day.
translation.zh: 你总是说当年的事 今天就看你的了

translation.en: You can do it, you old sausage.
Wing Commander T.I. Fowler...
reporting for duty.
Well, come on. What are you waiting for ?
translation.zh: 好了 你们还在等什么？ 时间不多了 让这破飞机飞起来吧

translation.en: We haven't got all day. Let's get this crate off the ground.
translation.zh: 时间不多了 让这破飞机飞起来吧

translation.en: [ Ginger ] Fowler ! Now !
Roger ! Contact !
Cleared for takeoff !
Chocks away !
[ Simultaneously ] Chocks away !
- Full throttle ! - Full throttle !
We need more power !
translation.zh: 我们需要更多动力 我无法创造奇迹 机长 它就这么多动力

translation.en: I cannot work miracles, Cap'n ! We're givin' her all she's got !
translation.zh: 我无法创造奇迹 机长 它就这么多动力

translation.en: - Gotcha ! - Hard right !
Oh, mother !
Turn her around. I'll get the ramp.
translation.zh: 掉头 我去把板子弄好

translation.en: Put the ramp down. [ Gasps ]
You are going to be a pie !
Ginger !
Rocky !
Heads up !
- [ Bell Jingles ] - Look out !
- Aah ! - Clear the runway !
Ginger ! Let's go !
We're flying ! [ Excited Chattering ]
- Aah ! - That's for leaving.
translation.zh: 这是赏你的 因为你不告而别

translation.en: And this is for coming back.
translation.zh: 这也是赏你的 因为你回来了

translation.en: - [ All Screaming, Clucking ] - Great Scot ! What was that?
translation.zh: 伟大的苏格兰 什么情况？

translation.en: A cling-on, Cap'n ! And the engines can't take it !
translation.zh: 一个搭机的家伙 机长 引擎受不了了

translation.en: Oh, goodness.
Babs ! Scissors !
Bingo.
Lower me down.
-But, Ginger, I-- -Just do it.
[ Fowler ] Increase velocity !
-What does that mean ? -It means pedal your flippin' giblets out !
translation.zh: 什么意思？ 意思是往死了蹬

translation.en: - Lower ! - I'm trying !
- Fowler, look out ! - [ Gasps ]
translation.zh: 福勒 小心 （鸡肉馅饼）

translation.en: - Whoa ! - Oh ! Ginger !
Fire ! Fire !
- Me eggs. - [ Blubbering ]
Blea-aah ! [ Growls ]
More ammo ! Hurry !
translation.zh: 再来点蛋 快点 -我们没有鸡蛋了 -金吉 小心

translation.en: - We got no more eggs ! - Ginger ! Look out !
translation.zh: -我们没有鸡蛋了 -金吉 小心

translation.en: No !
- Huh ? - Bye-bye. - Aaah ! - Bombs away !
- Mr. Tweedy ! - [ All Cheering ]
Oh, that was good. That was good !
The old bird bought it ! [ Laughing ]
Mrs. Tweedy ! Mrs. Twee--
I told you they was organized.
translation.zh: 我就说吧 它们是有组织的

translation.en: We did it, everyone !
- [ All Exclaiming ] - Whoa ! [ Fowler ] Keep peddling ! We're not there yet !
translation.zh: 继续踩 我们还没到呢

translation.en: You can't see paradise if you don't pedal !
translation.zh: 不踩踏板就到不了天堂

translation.en: Put your drumsticks into it !
That's what I told him, what, what.
We were losing altitude, you see, and heading for a fearful prang.
translation.zh: 我们正在失去高度 就要坠机了

translation.en: This is a lovely holiday.
I'll be sad to go back.
translation.zh: 回去的话我会很难过的

translation.en: Safety at all times is imperative.
Now, wind 'er up and...
Whee ! let 'er go !
- [ Excited Chattering ] - So...
is it as good as you imagined ?
translation.zh: 跟你想象的一样美好吗？

translation.en: No. [ Gasps ]
It's better. [ Chuckles ]
Come on. I'll show you how to play cricket. [ Chattering Continues ]
translation.zh: 来吧 我教你打板球

translation.en: [ Nick ] 'Ey, 'ey, here's a thought.
Why don't we get an egg and start our own chicken farm ?
translation.zh: 我们可以拿个鸡蛋自己开养鸡场

translation.en: That way we'll have all the eggs we could eat.
translation.zh: 那样我们就有吃不完的蛋了

translation.en: Right. We'll need a chicken then.
translation.zh: 对 那我们需要一只鸡

translation.en: No. No, we'll need an egg.
translation.zh: 不 我们需要一个鸡蛋

translation.en: You have the egg first. That's where you get the chicken from.
translation.zh: 先有蛋才有鸡 不对

translation.en: No, that's cobblers. If you don't have a chicken, where you gonna get an egg ?
From the chicken that comes from the egg.
translation.zh: 从鸡蛋里孵出来的鸡下的 对 但你要有蛋才能有鸡

translation.en: Yeah, but you have to have an egg to have a chicken.
translation.zh: 对 但你要有蛋才能有鸡

translation.en: Yeah, but you gotta get the chicken first to get the egg,
translation.zh: 对 但先有鸡才有那个蛋

translation.en: and then the egg-- you get the chicken out.
Hang on. Let's go over this again.
translation.zh: 等等 我们再来一遍

translation.en: [ Nick ] The egg, obviously.
Rollin' along, happy as Larry.
Then, crack ! Hatches into the first chicken.
translation.zh: 然后裂开 孵出第一只鸡

translation.en: [ Fetcher ] Yeah, but where'd the egg come from, then ?
translation.zh: 对 可鸡蛋是从哪里来的？

translation.en: [ Nick ] What do you mean, where'd it come from ?
translation.zh: 什么意思？ 鸡蛋开心得滚来滚去

translation.en: [ Fetcher ] Egg comes rollin' along, happy as Larry.
It's wonderin', where'd it come from ?
translation.zh: 我想知道这蛋是从哪来的？

translation.en: Without a chicken, you get no egg to come rollin' along.
translation.zh: 没有鸡 就没有鸡蛋滚来滚去

translation.en: [ Nick ] Well, conversely, without an egg to hatch into the chicken,
translation.zh: 反过来说 如果没有孵出鸡的蛋 就没有下蛋的鸡

translation.en: there will be no chicken to lay the other egg that hatches into the chicken...
translation.zh: 就没有下蛋的鸡 去孵出小鸡

translation.en: that lays the egg I mentioned in the first place.
So we got two eggs now?

translation.en: -[ Mutters ] Gitface. -[ Mutters ] Pillock.
[ Nick ] Thinks he's such a big shot 'cause he's got his name on a poster.

translation.en: These show biz folk are all the same.

translation.en: -You said it, mate. -I know.
